import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Form, Label, Input, Button, Toast, Alert, Row,Col } from "reactstrap"; import { send } from "emailjs-com"; export const Contact = () => { const [toSend, setToSend] = useState({ from_name: "", email_id: "", message: "", }); const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); send( "service_dq8ta89", "template_a39ei36", toSend, "user_kkujkVfgHBuo6QJ8kXvmt" ) .then((response) => { console.log("SUCCESS!", response.status, response.text); }) .catch((err) => { console.log("FAILED...", err); }); setToSend({ from_name: "", email_id: "", message: "" }); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setToSend({ ...toSend, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( <>

LEAVE A MESSAGE -{" "}

{" "}
{" "}
setShow(false)} show={show} delay={3000} autohide> Bootstrap 11 mins ago Woohoo, you're reading this text in a Toast!

); };
